item.title: Building a GraphQL API with AWS AppSync Using Direct Lambda Resolvers in .NET
item.description: GraphQL APIs enables clients to request specific data sets, reducing over-fetching compared to traditional REST APIs, which return fixed data structures with unnecessary fields. Unlike REST APIs that require multiple endpoints and round trips to gather related data, GraphQL provides a single endpoint.
